org.gbif.occurrencestore.persistence.api

Interface VerbatimOccurrencePersistenceService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VerbatimOccurrencePersistenceServiceImpl

    public interface VerbatimOccurrencePersistenceService
    An interface to govern the creating and updating of VerbatimOccurrence objects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VerbatimOccurrence get(Integer key)
      Get the VerbatimOccurrence with the given key.
      void update(VerbatimOccurrence occurrence)
      Updates an existing VerbatimOccurrence.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        @Nullable
VerbatimOccurrence get(Integer key)
        Get the VerbatimOccurrence with the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the occurrence (Integer rather than int for use in methods/classes using generic types)
        Returns:
        the VerbatimOccurrence, or null if it is not found
        Throws:
        org.gbif.api.exception.ServiceUnavailableException - if the underlying data connection fails

      • update

        void update(VerbatimOccurrence occurrence)
        Updates an existing VerbatimOccurrence. Note that VerbatimOccurrences can never be inserted as new - they must always have come from a Fragment originally, and therefore already have an occurrence key.
        Parameters:
        occurrence - the occurrence to update
        Throws:
        org.gbif.api.exception.ServiceUnavailableException - if the underlying data connection fails
        IllegalArgumentException - if the key field of the occurrence is null
